definitions.definition: a group of vehicles or ships that travel together, especially for protection:
examples: A convoy of trucks containing supplies was sent to the famine area.

definitions.definition: travelling one behind another in a row:
examples: Shall we all drive to the party in convoy so we don't get lost?

definitions.definition: to travel with a vehicle or group of people to make certain that they arrive safely:
examples: Two tanks convoyed the trucks across the border.
